meanings.definition: A person who is addicted to drugs.
meanings.sent1: The junkie struggled with his addiction to drugs.
meanings.sent2: She knew she was a junkie when she couldn't go a day without using.
meanings.sent3: The junkie tried to convince everyone that he was just a 'casual user'.
meanings.sent4: Her addiction to drugs had turned her into a junkie, craving a fix every hour.
meanings.sent5: The junkie's life revolved around finding the next high, ignoring everything else.

meanings.definition: A person who is obsessed with or has a strong interest in a particular activity or thing.
meanings.sent1: As a book junkie, she spent hours in the library every day.
meanings.sent2: He was a tech junkie, always buying the latest gadgets.
meanings.sent3: The movie junkie had seen every film in the theater at least twice.
meanings.sent4: Her friend was a fashion junkie, constantly following the latest trends.
meanings.sent5: The music junkie had a collection of vinyl records that filled an entire room.
